name: Mecha Phantom Beast O-Lion
effectText: While you control a Token, this card cannot be destroyed by battle or card effects. If this card is sent to the GY: You can Special Summon 1 "Mecha Phantom Beast Token" (Machine/WIND/Level 3/ATK 0/DEF 0). You can only use this effect of "Mecha Phantom Beast O-Lion" once per turn. You can banish this card from your GY; immediately after this effect resolves, Normal Summon 1 "Mecha Phantom Beast" monster from your hand.
